body.query: SELECT count(*) as count_ FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}}
SELECT count(*) FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where host = 'service.internal'
SELECT SUM(bytesReqHdrBe) FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}}
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where Hostname like 'aws-logs-frontend-prod-iad12-cell-1-31.iad12.amazon.com' limit 10000
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where host = 'service.internal' AND Hostname like '%cell-1-31.iad12%' LIMIT 10000
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where Hostname like '%-31.iad12.amazon.com' limit 10000
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where Hostname like 'aws-logs-frontend-prod-%' limit 10000
SELECT count(*), Hostname, Marketplace FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where host = 'service.internal' GROUP BY 2,3 LIMIT 10000
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where Hostname like '%-cell-1-%' limit 10000
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where host = 'service.internal' ORDER BY @timestamp asc limit 10000
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} ORDER BY @timestamp asc limit 10000
SELECT SUM(bytesReqHdrBe) FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} group by Hostname limit 10000
SELECT * FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} limit 10000
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT REMOTE_ADDR) FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}}
SELECT MAX(bytesReqHdrBe) FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where Hostname like 'aws-logs-frontend-prod-iad12-cell-1-31.iad12.amazon.com'
SELECT DISTINCT Hostname FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT requestId) FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} limit 10000
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT REMOTE_ADDR) as distinct_ct FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where host = 'service.internal'
SELECT sum(CAST(reqContentLength as double)) as val FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where host = 'service.internal'

SELECT MAX(bytesReqHdrFe), MAX(bytesReqHdrBe), MAX(bytesReqBodyFe), MAX(bytesReqBodyBe), MAX(bytesRespHdrFe), MAX(bytesRespHdrBe), MAX(bytesRespBodyFe), MAX(reqContentLength), MAX(putBufferedBytes) FROM {{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} where host = 'service.internal' LIMIT 10000
